title: Beet & Goat Cheese Salad
summary: Beet & Goat Cheese Salad might be just the side dish you are searching for. One portion of this dish contains around 8g of protein, 61g of fat, and a total of 605 calories. For $3.02 per serving, this recipe covers 12% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. This recipe serves 3. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes roughly 45 minutes. This recipe is liked by 2 foodies and cooks. If you have salad mix, lemon juice, olive oil, and a few other ingredients on hand, you can make it. It is a good option if you're following a gluten free, primal, and vegetarian diet. All things considered, we decided this recipe deserves a spoonacular score of 50%. This score is solid. Similar recipes include Beet Salad with Goat Cheese, Beet & Goat Cheese Salad, and Beet and Goat Cheese Salad.
